name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior DevOps Engineer with 13+ years of experience in Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) and DevOps practices, excelling in building and maintaining high-performance applications across healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **AWS**, **Azure**, and **OpenStack**, with extensive knowledge in **Linux**, **Networking**, and cloud-native deployments including **Kubernetes** and **Openshift**. Skilled in automation and configuration management using **Ansible**, **Chef**, and **Jenkins**, along with strong version control expertise in **Git** and artifact management using **Artifactory**.

Demonstrated hands-on expertise in programming with **Python**, with exposure to **Golang**, **Ruby**, and **Scala** for various scripting and development tasks. Capable of implementing CI/CD pipelines for seamless integration and continuous delivery. Well-versed in compliance-driven development aligned with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Strong communication and problem-solving skills create effective collaborations and innovative solutions.

experience.responsibilities:
- Implemented **DevOps** practices by designing and building CI/CD pipelines using **Jenkins**, **GitHub Actions**, and **CircleCI**, ensuring seamless code integration and deployment across **Linux** environments.
- Utilized **Ansible** and **Chef** for configuration management, automating deployments, and system configuration across **AWS** and **Azure** cloud infrastructures.
- Managed and optimized **Linux** server environments, ensuring high availability and scalability through **Kubernetes** and **OpenShift** orchestration.
- Enhanced system reliability and performance by integrating **Docker** containers into the deployment process, facilitating microservices architecture transformation with a focus on fault tolerance and scalability.
- Developed and maintained infrastructure as code using **Terraform**, achieving a **20%** reduction in provisioning time across cloud resources.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to troubleshoot and resolve complex **networking** issues, achieving a **15%** improvement in system uptime metrics.
- Leveraged **Python** scripts to automate routine tasks and streamline workflows, enhancing team productivity and reducing manual intervention by **30%**.
- Conducted performance monitoring and logging using tools like **Prometheus** and **Grafana**, leading to an effective resolution of bottlenecks and improved system diagnostics.
- Fostered effective communication within the team, leading to more efficient problem-solving and knowledge sharing across different levels of project execution.
- Championed best practices for security measures across the stack, employing network segmentation and workload isolations to protect against vulnerabilities.

Utilized **AWS** and **Azure** to modernize core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture using **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django), enhancing scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems.
Employed **DevOps** practices to streamline development workflows, integrating **Jenkins** for CI/CD processes in **Kubernetes** and **OpenShift** environments.
Built interactive front-end applications with **React** (18), **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, utilizing **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to create sleek, responsive interfaces for financial tools and admin panels.
Delivered real-time analytics dashboards with **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, providing operations teams with instant insights into transactions and anomalies.
Designed and deployed a robust event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring asynchronous communication across critical workflows such as payments, alerts, and compliance.
Developed ETL pipelines for ingesting financial data from internal and third-party sources using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, supporting both batch and real-time processing.
Built and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enabling proactive detection of suspicious activity based on user behavior and transaction patterns.
Created ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow** to integrate model inference into backend services.
Implemented infrastructure as code (IaC) strategies with **Ansible** and **Chef**, ensuring consistent environments across deployments by managing configuration effectively.
Practiced strong **communication** and **problem-solving** skills to coordinate with cross-functional teams, achieving a 30% reduction in deployment times across services.

Implemented SRE principles to enhance system reliability and performance, ensuring uptime of over **99.9%** for critical e-commerce services.
Managed CI/CD processes using **Jenkins** and **Git**, enabling automated deployment pipelines that reduced release cycles by **30%**.
Configured and maintained container orchestration platforms like **Kubernetes** and **OpenShift**, improving application deployment efficiency and scaling capabilities.
Integrated infrastructure as code using **Ansible** and **Chef**, allowing for consistent server configurations and reducing setup time by **40%**.
Administered Linux servers, optimizing performance through system monitoring and resource management techniques.
Utilized cloud services including **AWS**, **Azure**, and **OpenStack** for various deployment, storage, and networking solutions, enhancing overall system flexibility.
Collaborated with development teams employing **Python** for automation scripting and workflow optimization, resolving issues faster through effective problem-solving.
Maintained robust network configurations ensuring high security and seamless communication across services and teams.
Developed and documented processes that improved operational transparency and team communication, contributing to a **15%** increase in overall team efficiency.
Ensured high-quality code deployments by leveraging version control best practices and storage solutions like **Artifactory**.
